story.name: Invite Us To Speak
story.content: {"_uid":"a0426eda-eee4-45f0-a94d-e60541067966","body":[{"_uid":"fd22c82a-b6a4-4aa2-aa09-7530cc1df33d","title":"INVITE US  TO SPEAK.","component":"hero","hero_image":{"id":null,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},"button_text":"","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Our team are always out on the road or online delivering talks and awareness sessions to businesses, charities and other organisations nationwide. From prisons, to some of the world’s leading brands, we’ve delivered talks in a variety of settings. Our focus has always been on raising awareness and spreading the word to as many people as possible, which is why our talks are offered free of charge.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"1e55ac7a-38de-4aaf-8f2b-095193c983b2","label":"","title":"","images":[{"id":4708193,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x750/dcf40808af/invite-us-to-speak-slider-1.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708191,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x1050/68317f6afe/invite-us-to-speak-slider-2.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708192,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x600/a7be704919/invite-us-to-speak-slider-3.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708190,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x450/5e35893372/invite-us-to-speak-slider-4.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708189,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x1050/a024220c33/invite-us-to-speak-slider-5.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708188,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x600/f78101ab48/invite-us-to-speak-slider-6.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708187,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x750/874a5ce060/invite-us-to-speak-slider-7.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708186,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x450/3ce58f5ada/invite-us-to-speak-slider-8.jpg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},{"id":4708185,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/751x750/40cf8740ef/invite-us-to-speak-slide WE SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Since 2016, we have delivered our story and the stories of our staff, volunteers and trustees to thousands of businesses, organisations and charities. Our sessions consist of an overview of our story, the importance of talking, the story of the man delivering the session and how our services can be accessed. We can deliver to as many members of your organisation as you would like, both online and in person, as many times as you need. All sessions delivered are free of charge, our priority as always is awareness and making our sessions available to as many men as possible.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"To make an enquiry regarding us delivering a free session, email ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"mailto:info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":null}},{"type":"underline"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"hard_break"}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"BOOK
